questions.question: What is the process of selecting relevant and significant attributes from a dataset to improve model performance? _________ Selection (9)
Which attribute selection method ranks features based on their importance and selects the top k features? Top-K Feature __________ (9)
What is the primary goal of attribute selection in machine learning? Dimensionality __________ (9)
Which attribute selection technique uses a greedy algorithm to build the feature subset incrementally?  Forward _______(9)
In model testing, what term refers to the portion of the dataset that is not used during training and is used to evaluate model performance? (14)
What is the process of assessing a model's performance on unseen data? Model _______(7)
Which model testing method evaluates a model's performance using a separate validation dataset to tune hyperparameters? _____-Validation (5)
What is one of the dangers of model testing? (10)
